document.full_text: heavy rain drenched a drought-ravaged swathe of southern and eastern china, killing 52 people and forcing more than 100,000 to evacuate, state media reported on wednesday.
document.title: china floods kill 52, force 100,000 to evacuate
lines_and_colors: heavy rain drenched a drought-ravaged swathe of southern and eastern china, killing 52 people and forcing more than 100,000 to evacuate, state media reported on wednesday.
